amendment.description: Making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2669 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Cloture on amendment SA 2669 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 270.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2669 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 2669 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S6868, S6869) Making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 2669 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 270.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2669 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cochran.
